item.description:
What are the secrets of a relationship? How does a relationship develop? When we address our own mind and are aware of ourselves, our relationships flourish. If we are unaware, we make the same mistakes in every relationship- if we cannot row one boat, we cannot row any other.

Come and learn about the mind, its tendencies, and qualities that help relationships flourish. And come and learn what meditation has to do with all of this-- it is more relevant than you may think to being an open and loving person.
item.name: Secrets of Relationships: Mind and Meditation
